description: This CSS file contains style definitions for a theme management system, with variables for light and dark themes, along with styles for various components such as the App, headers, links, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including alignment, background color, and text color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header component including background color and layout.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animations.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Animation keyframes for spinning the application logo.
